amendment.description: To require reports on the United States strategy for relief and reconstruction efforts in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1864 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1864 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S12796-12797) To require reports on the United States strategy for relief and reconstruction efforts in Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1864 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1864 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici.
